lines.content: **Tob Tob** is an **interactive text-based desktop app for managing tasks,
optimized for use via a Command Line Interface (CLI)** while still having
the benefits of a ***Graphical User Interface (GUI)***. Regardless of whether
you are tech-savvy or not, **Tob Tob** will bring your tasks management
skill to another level ðŸš€ ðŸš€ ðŸš€!
- Words in `UPPER_CASE` are the parameters to be supplied by the user,
e.g. in `todo TODO_NAME`, `TODO_NAME` is a parameter which can be used
- Commands that are not in lower case will still be acceptable, e.g.
`TODO Apply for internships` or `Todo Apply for internships`.
- `YYYY-MM-DD` refers to the standard date format, e.g. `2022-12-31`.
Invalid dates or dates that are not in this format won't be accepted.
- If parameters are specified for commands that do not take in parameters,
the input will be rejected and error message will be shown.
Adds a todo task to Tob Tob's brain.
Adds a deadline task to Tob Tob's brain.
- An error will be shown if the input satisfies one of the three conditions below
Adds an event task to Tob Tob's brain.
- An error will be shown if the input satisfies one of the three conditions below
Shows a list of all tasks stored in Tob Tob's brain.
- An error will be shown if the command is followed by parameters
Marks a task stored in Tob Tob's brain as done.
- An error will be shown if `TASK_NUMBER` satisfies one of the three conditions below
- Exceeds the number of tasks in Tob Tob's brain
### Marking a task as not done: `unmark`
Marks a task stored in Tob Tob's brain as not done.
- An error will be shown if `TASK_NUMBER` satisfies one of the three conditions below
- Exceeds the number of tasks in Tob Tob's brain
Deletes a task stored in Tob Tob's brain.
- An error will be shown if `TASK_NUMBER` satisfies one of the three conditions below
- Exceeds the number of tasks in Tob Tob's brain
Finds a task stored in Tob Tob's brain by the name or part of the name.
Views all the commands available in Tob Tob's dictionary.
- An error will be shown if the command is followed by parameters
- An error will be shown if the command is followed by parameters

**Tob Tob** is an **interactive text-based desktop app for managing tasks,
optimized for use via a Command Line Interface (CLI)** while still having
the benefits of a ***Graphical User Interface (GUI)***. Regardless of whether
you are tech-savvy or not, **Tob Tob** will bring your tasks management
skill to another level ðŸš€ ðŸš€ ðŸš€!
- Words in `UPPER_CASE` are the parameters to be supplied by the user,
e.g. in `todo TODO_NAME`, `TODO_NAME` is a parameter which can be used
- Commands that are not in lower case will still be acceptable, e.g.
`TODO Apply for internships` or `Todo Apply for internships`.
- `YYYY-MM-DD` refers to the standard date format, e.g. `2022-12-31`.
Invalid dates or dates that are not in this format won't be accepted.
- If parameters are specified for commands that do not take in parameters,
the input will be rejected and error message will be shown.

assert getSize() > 0 : "brain size should not be 0 after adding task";
* Removes a {@link Task} in the specified index of taskList and
* returns the {@link String} representation of the task.
* @param index index of the {@link Task} in taskList to remove
* Returns a {@link String} of {@link Task}s inside brain.
result.add("Abrakadabraaa! Here's what's inside Tob Tob's Brain:");

* @throws TobTobException If {@code commandDescription} is an empty string
public String showBrain(String commandDescription) throws TobTobException {
assert commandDescription.equals("") : "command description shouldn't be empty at this point";
* Returns a {@link String} indicating the marked {@link Task}.
* @param commandDescription a {@link String} passed by parser
* @throws TobTobException If {@code commandDescription} is an empty {@link String}/not an {@link Integer}/bigger
public String markTask(String commandDescription) throws TobTobException {
assert !commandDescription.equals("") : "command description shouldn't be empty at this point";
result += "Yoohooo! Tob Tob has marked this task as done:\n";
* Returns a {@link String} indicating the unmarked {@link String}.
* @param commandDescription a {@link String} passed by parser
* @throws TobTobException If {@code commandDescription} is an empty {@link String}/not an {@link Integer}/bigger
public String unmarkTask(String commandDescription) throws TobTobException {
assert !commandDescription.equals("") : "command description shouldn't be empty at this point";
result += "Saddd! Tob Tob has marked this task as not done yet:\n";
* @param taskDescriptionDatetime {@code String[]} of taskDescription and datetime

*      for {@link Deadline} is not separated using " /by "/{@code commandDescription}
*      for {@link Deadline} is not separated using " /at "/{@code taskType} is unrecognized
public String putInBrain(String taskType, String[] taskDescriptionDatetime, int separatorIndex)
assert !taskDescriptionDatetime[0].equals("") : "command description shouldn't be empty at this point";
result += "Wiii! Now Tob Tob's brain has more stuffs\n";
result += "Wiii! Now Tob Tob's brain has more stuffs\n";
result += "Wiii! Now Tob Tob's brain has more stuffs\n";
* Returns a {@link String} indicating the trashed {@link Task}.
* @param commandDescription a {@link String} passed by parser
* @throws TobTobException If {@code commandDescription} is an empty {@link String}/not an {@link Integer}/bigger
public String trashFromBrain(String commandDescription) throws TobTobException {
assert !commandDescription.equals("") : "command description shouldn't be empty at this point";
result += "Ewww! This task is no longer in Tob Tob's Brain:\n";
* Returns a {@link String} of {@link Task}s that have the specified keyword.
* @param keyword a {@link String} that wants to be searched
result += "Ulalaaa! Here are the matching tasks in your list:\n";
* Returns a {@link String} indicating the hibernating.
* @param commandDescription a {@link String} passed by parser
* @throws TobTobException If {@code commandDescription} is not empty.
public String hibernate(String commandDescription) throws TobTobException {
assert commandDescription.equals("") : "there shouldn't be any command description at this point";
result += "Byeee! Tob Tob is sick of you\n";
* Returns a {@link String} of the short guide.
* @param commandDescription a {@link String} passed by parser
* @throws TobTobException If {@code commandDescription} is not empty.
public String showShortGuide(String commandDescription) throws TobTobException {
result += "Hi there! Here are the available commands that Tob Tob understands (Don't forget to replace "
result += "- To add a todo task, type \n  \"todo TODO_NAME\"\n";
result += "- To add a deadline task, type \n  \"deadline DEADLINE_NAME \\by YYYY-MM-DD\"\n";
result += "- To add an event task, type \n  \"event EVENT_NAME \\at YYYY-MM-DD\"\n";
result += "- To list all the tasks, type \n  \"list\"\n";
result += "- To mark a task, type \n  \"mark TASK_NUMBER\"\n";
result += "- To unmark a task, type \n  \"unmark TASK_NUMBER\"\n";
result += "- To delete a task, type \n  \"delete TASK_NUMBER\"\n";
result += "- To find a task, type \n  \"find TASK_NAME\"\n";
result += "- To see the list of available commands, type \n  \"help\"\n";
result += "- To say goodbye to Tob Tob, type \n  \"bye\"";

"Oopsieee! Command \"%s\" should be followed with an integer index";
"Oopsieee! Task name and datetime format is incorrect.\n"
+ "Please indicate task name and datetime separated using \"%s\" for %s";
"Oopsieee! Command \"%s\" is not in Tob Tob Dictionary";
"Oopsieee! There are only %s tasks in Tob Tob Brain.\n"
+ "Index should be a positive number and less than %s.\n"
"Oopsieee! Tob Tob cannot recognize the input datetime '%s'.\n"
+ "Please make sure that it's in format 'yyyy-mm-dd'";
"Oopsieee! There is no file in path %s";
+ "Seems like the file has been modified externally.\n"
+ "Please fix the file/delete it and restart application to continue using Tob Tob";

<TextField fx:id="userInput" layoutY="558.0" onAction="#handleUserInput" prefHeight="41.0" prefWidth="324.0" promptText="Type "help" to see the list of commands" style="-fx-background-color: #000000; -fx-text-fill: white; -fx-prompt-text-fill: derive(-fx-control-inner-background, -30%);" AnchorPane.bottomAnchor="1.0">
